pullRequest.title: Add basic resize functionality
pullRequest.bodyText:
What is it?

 Bug fix (user facing)
 Feature (user facing)
 Code base improvement (dev facing)
 Meta improvement to the project (dev facing)

Description of the changes in your PR
Allow resizing of app when OS + device support it.
Fixes the following issue(s)
Closes #3947
See https://codeberg.org/gitnex/GitNex/commit/9e352df1ed7d1d285fde61632822e2db5d128f16
See https://developer.samsung.com/samsung-dex/modify-optimizing.html#Enabling-Multi-Window-support
Testing apk
NewPipe_basic_resize_APK.zip
Agreement

 I carefully read the contribution guidelines and agree to them.

@mqus @Domiuns @MD77MD Can you please test if the app works properly when changing the orientation of your device, opening the keyboard when typing something in the searchbar and in dialogs (e.g. when creating a new feed group)?
